definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
the Camp David agreement of 1978 brokered by President Jimmy Carter between Israel and Egypt

sentences.english: Fights the mechanism through on - line machine-made peace treaty, can quicker obtain the high integral.
sentences.chinese: 通过联机机制和约战机制，能够更快的得到高积分。

sentences.english: So they went in to make sacrifices and burnt offerings.
sentences.chinese: 耶户和约拿达进去，献平安祭和燔祭。

sentences.english: Immediately this was done, I completed an arrangement with my publishers.
sentences.chinese: 这书一脱稿，我马上和出版家订好了出版和约。

sentences.english: The sons of Laadan； the chief was Jehiel， and Zetham， and Joel， three.
sentences.chinese: 拉但的长子是耶歇，还有细坦和约珥，共三人。

sentences.english: Well, we'll see if Golz can manoeuvre them a little.
sentences.chinese: 我以为我可以和约达一样指导他。

sentences.english: So the king of Israel and Jehoshaphat and the king of Edom went down to him.
sentences.chinese: 于是以色列王和约沙法，并以东王都下去见他。

sentences.english: We need not overemphasize imperfections in the peace of Versailles.
sentences.chinese: 我们不必过分强调凡尔赛和约的缺陷。

sentences.english: And sure enough the next day Saul and Jonathan die, they lose the battle.
sentences.chinese: 果然第二天扫罗和约拿单死了，他们输掉了战争。

sentences.english: This is domestic law, but it is related to the reserved powers of SFPT.
sentences.chinese: 这是美国国内法，但它是关系到旧金山和约的保留权。

sentences.english: And Shabbethai and Jozabad, of the chief of the Levites, had the oversight of the outward business of the house of God.
sentences.chinese: 又有利未人的族长，沙比太和约撒拔管理神殿的外事。

sentences.english: The wife of King Ahab and mother of Ahaziah and Joram (Jehoram) Kings of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 亚哈的妻子和以色列王亚哈谢和约兰的母亲。

sentences.english: The sons of Ladan: Jehiel the first, Zetham and Joel-three in all.
sentences.chinese: 拉但的长子是耶歇，还有细坦和约珥，共三人。

sentences.english: The peace treaty was signed in Paris.
And Shabbethai and Jozabad, of the chief of the Levites, had the oversight of the outward business of the house of God.
sentences.chinese: 又有利未人的族长沙比太和约撒拔管理上帝殿的外事。

sentences.english: Hand mix everything for ten minutes until it thickens like paste.
sentences.chinese: 用手慢慢将以上材料混和约十分钟，至将状。

sentences.english: Hungary is representative of the Kelanmoer about Neil.

definition: contract of alliance/oath or treaty between allies
to form an alliance/to ally oneself with/allied with/aligned/to bond with
credentials (of a diplomat)/documents exchanged between nations/national or dynastic history book
Tianjin agreement of 1885 between Li Hongzhang 李鴻章|李鸿章[Li3 Hong2 zhang1] and ITŌ Hirobumi 伊藤博文[Yi1 teng2 Bo2 wen2] to pull Qing and Japanese troops out of Korea
